name: Geometry Love
description:
Move around, suck shapes and match them with similar shapes to score points and gain more time.

There's a bit of a learning curve, watching the video and/or the GIFs is  advised.

Controls: 

Mouse cursor - Movement

LMB - Throw carried shape

RMB - Suck shapes in

The radar points towards the closest shape, if you're carrying a shape already it'll point to the closest shape of the same type.

Game over when: Time runs out.

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2019.1

If you are having trouble playing this game in your browser, please ensure that Hardware Acceleration is enabled in your browser settings.
